name: Open Science Framework
description: "The Open Science Framework (OSF) is a tool that promotes open, centralized workflows by enabling capture of different aspects and products of the research lifecycle, including developing a research idea, designing a study, storing and analyzing collected data, and writing and publishing reports or papers."

name: PsychoPy
description: "PsychoPy® is a free cross-platform package allowing you to run a wide range of experiments in the behavioral sciences (neuroscience, psychology, psychophysics, linguistics...) "

name: OpenNeuro
description: "A free and open platform for validating and sharing BIDS-compliant MRI, PET, MEG, EEG, and iEEG data"

name: C-BIG (Clinical Biospecimen Imaging and Genetic Repository)
description: "The Neuro C-BIG is the first Open Science biorepository for patients with neurological  disease and healthy controls and an open access resource for the global scientific community."
